description:
Converts offline or hosted EDB files into PSTs with 100% precision. Recommended by MVPs and admins, the software supports prioritizing mailbox conversion without affecting server performance.

Converts offline or hosted EDB files into PSTs with 100% precision. Recommended by MVPs and admins, the software supports prioritizing mailbox conversion without affecting server performance.

- Converts large EDB files into PSTs - No File Size Limitation.
- Exports offline EDB files and public folders to live Exchange Server or Microsoft 365.
- Processes up to 8 mailboxes simultaneously using parallel processing technique.
